verbose_text: In contrast, co-application of DHPG and PE strongly inhibited GABA B IPSCs (69.53% +/- 3.66% of control, n = 8; p < 0.001, paired t test; XREF_FIG) and this was significantly reduced by AM251 pretreatment (87.09% +/- 2.36% of control, n = 9; p < 0.05 versus HEAT + PE, unpaired t test; XREF_FIG).
evidence: DHPG and PE strongly inhibited GABA
